name: KEK-KO-NEN 3000
description:
KEK-KO-NEN 3000 is an endless tunnel dive. Enjoy the music and try to catch all the characters and coins to make a highscore and unlock alternative costumes!

DISCLAIMER:

Urho Kaleva Kekkonen was Finland’s 8th president.

This game plays on the pop culture image of President Kekkonen and is not intended as any sort of commentary on politics or the actual person.

The game is based on the pop art project of Miikka Harjuntausta, and Music of Joonas Samposalo. Have fun playing!
